Reviews.Title: No web-cam as brochure, failed microphone
Reviews.Author: Rodrigo  Garcia Berguecio
Reviews.Content: Very sad.My dad bought this laptop as a present for me, so we can talk via Skipe,well, i opened the box i did found out it came without web-cam and internal microphone as the brochure from HP. Then, after buying 4 kinds of microphones i noticed the external microphone is broke. Amazon sent me to talk directly with Hp, no way, Hp is imposible to reach, nobody helped. Two weeks ago i went to Best Buy to buy a printer, the salesman told me to bring the laptop so they can sent it to Hp,two weeeks ago i received a e-mail from Hp warning about the broken microphone, i hope i can change this laptop with one with internal webcam and internal microphone, my laptop is still in guarantee so,i hope to change it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Laptop for the $$
Reviews.Author: R. Adamson
Reviews.Content: Caught it on sale at xmas and it has lived up to my expectations and then some. The Win7 operating system would have cost almost as much as I spent for the laptop. Nice screen, love the keyboard layout, and the simulated stainless steel keyboard trim is a nice touch. Would definitly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Nice Laptop
Reviews.Author: Paul Garland
Reviews.Content: If you can buy it cheap this is a really fine laptop.  Especially if you don't want one with a web cam.

Reviews.Title: best present ever
Reviews.Author: Jonie Deland
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love it. This is my first laptop. If I could purchase more at the price I bought mine I would buy more for my family.

Reviews.Title: great computer! My daughter loves it
Reviews.Author: T. Pinto
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 11 yr. old daughter and she absolutely loves it! Great product, Great price!

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop!
Reviews.Author: NurseNancy "Stats User"
Reviews.Content: Got it Black Friday for less than two hundred including ship and tax.  Have been using for 3 months now and no problems.  It replaced my 5 yr old Compaq and I'm loving it!  Great deal for $197...

Reviews.Title: VERY SATISFIED  -
Reviews.Author: LOVE MUSIC
Reviews.Content: I was VERY happy with my purchase of the HP LAPTOP.It replaced an older (Dell) laptop.  I find it easier touse and easier read...it was an excellent choice and anexcellent price.It was delivered very quickly (as promised by Amazon). Ifound it in excellent condition.I feel confident shopping Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: HP Laptop is tops!
Reviews.Author: J. Hepler
Reviews.Content: This laptop was purchased to use in addition to our desktop. It is a perfect addition to our home office. It is lightweight, fast efficient, and came with Windows 7 preloaded. If there is any complaint, it is that the battery life is not as long as claimed. For me, it only seems to stay charged for about 2 hours before needing to be plugged in, and that may be due to the fact I play lots of games on it. Over all it is an excellent laptop, and I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: HP G60-501NR Laptop Review
Reviews.Author: Philip D. Delk
Reviews.Content: The laptop performs well and I am very satisfied with its performance. However, I was disappointed that a number of the software products were for a very limited time period. Either do not include them or make the initial license for at least a year.

Reviews.Title: HP G60-501NR 15.6 inch Black Laptop
Reviews.Author: bean
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves this computer--she found it dependable, easy to operate and the price was excellent--only problems she encountered were with the operating system--Windows 7--the rest of the world was not quite ready for this I guess but having that preloaded and price included sold me--and most of the operating issues have now been resolved--I could and would recommend this computer to anyone!

Reviews.Title: HP
Reviews.Author: Shar Shar
Reviews.Content: I love this laptop. It has everything I need, which isn't much, and for a great price. Very fast delivery. Excellent quality.

Reviews.Title: Black Friday Special
Reviews.Author: cpollack
Reviews.Content: Purchased this as a "lightning deal" on Black Friday.  Cheaper than a comparable computer at the big box stores, (plus there was no sales tax and free shipping).  While not a powerhouse computer, it's great for surfing the web, e-mail and word processing.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Calderon Castro "Pipo"
Reviews.Content: Excellent laptop, but i am sad, it was stolen in my country. You can buy this computer without any fear, it is great and also the price.

Reviews.Title: This is a great laptop for the money.
Reviews.Author: Melodie "2kidznus"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Thaksgiving Day special and love it.  It was easy to start up.  Windows 7 is a nice operating system, I ahev not had any problems.  I would like to see a longer lasting battery, the description did state @ 3 hours, but it would have been nice to have at least 5-6 hours.  If I used this outside the house it would be a problem,  My college age children  have different model HPs with no problems except the batteries, which I have had to replace (ordered from Amazon at a great price).  Despite the battery issue I would buy another HP.

Reviews.Title: Nice laptop for basic computing needs
Reviews.Author: M. Wolf
Reviews.Content: What I like:1. Unlike other HP laptops I have owned recently this one does not have the heat problems the others have had.  (this might in part be due to only having a single processor)2. Nice case design3. I personally like the touch pad on this model better than several of the other HPs I have owned4. It ships with Windows 7 and so far this has been a very stable systemCons:1.Only 2 G of RAM (this however is a very easy fix and HP has great video and illustrations on their web site for adding laptop RAM)2.With the single processor even some basic computing seems to slow down.  (However I am still able to run the latest version of Adobe Photoshop Elements which is a bit of a resource hog)I got this on a lightning deal at even at a higher price point I feel this is a nice value for the dollar for someone who is looking for a basic entry level laptop.

Reviews.Title: Price and Performance
Reviews.Author: J. Kiim "Review This"
Reviews.Content: This laptop delivers on performance and function.  Who said you have to pay a lot get to get a lot. Don't be fooled by the Celeron label...normally I would stay away from Celeron go with its bigger brother Pentium.  But in this case, with its upgraded W7 OS this computer diver on performance any normal user can enjoy.  Don't just look at the Gigahertz and Gigabytes...think about what your daily function will require.  If you are not a heavy gamer or a super duper tech savvy guy who will ping the living crap out of  a processor...this laptop will more than satisfy your daily activities for the next several years.Pro: Price and performanceCon: Battery life

Reviews.Title: Lightening deal buy
Reviews.Author: Archana Kedar "Cheche"
Reviews.Content: I won this laptop on lightening deal on black Friday. It was worth stalking the net to get a deal like this, I received it today, and got started.  It is amazing, definite 5 star for the price. Thanks Amazon!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!!!
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Lennington "Jo-Jo"
Reviews.Content: This is a capable laptop. I bought one for my father when it was only sale for $299.99 one morning at like 2:30am central time. I set it up for him and I have been using it and it performs very well... sad to say almost too well when compared to my 2007 MacBook.I would recommend it to anyone. In the sub 300 dollar range you can't get anything better. The screen has a very nice resolution and widescreen picture. The HDMI port and 5in1 card reader are nice additions. There really are no draw backs that I can see. I waited at Walmart for two similar HP laptips on black Friday... granted they are a bit different, but bottom line... waiting in line for 8hrs or just buying it with one click shopping on Amazon.... ummm I would take amazon any day.I would put a value on this computer around $350 dollars... maybe more depending on how badly I would want one. If you can get it cheaper than that BUY IT!!! Compared to a stripped down netbook versus this very nicely equipped HP model... hands down get the HP!!!!Bottom Line: nicely equipped, every day laptop. That is good for at home or possibly on the go. I wish it went past its lackluster looks design wise... but it still performs great and is a good price.

Reviews.Title: No Webcam as Described But Good Value Anyway
Reviews.Author: C. Ransom "queenransom"
Reviews.Content: The description says HP Webcam and Youcam software but it's no on the laptop. I am still satisfied with the purchase given I got it as a Black Friday deal and am using it more like a Netbook for surfing the Internet, networking and checking email. My more powerful tasks that require more memory will remain on another laptop, but this one is more portable and has better battery life.Likes:1. Lightweight2. Good battery life3. Nice 16:9 widescreen - graphics are HD quality.4. Windows 7 - it's nifty5. Number pad on the keyboard6. button to turn wifi off and power button are the only 2 buttons on this machine7. lightscribe8. Cost - got this for $197 during Black Friday!! That's the best part!9. Not filled with a bunch of crap software I won't use. Thank you HP. :)10. Easily connected to my wireless HP printer in one easy step11. Connected immediately to my home network with no problems12. Straight out of the box and was using it in 2 minutes!13. Slick integrated mouse pad design with lock button - easy to use.14. Appears to be expandable to 4gb.Challenges:1. volume is either controlled by the mouse on the tool bar or by using the function key and a volume key - no slide like other HP laptops2. no locking mechanism, the screen just folds down but doesn't latch to the keyboard like others3. Only one headphone jack, no sharing4. no docking station port! It will not fit my existing docking station :(5. no webcam for those who think it's on here.Also includes - 5 in one card reader (not CF cards though), an HDMI port, monitor port, 3 usb ports and the standard ports for ethernet and modems.All in all, a good value for what I paid for it and even a good value for the current price it's being sold at. Really only lacks blueray, the docking station port and the webcam to be more flexible but I can do without those things for this price.

Reviews.Title: ***NO WEBCAM** Mic is not working properly
Reviews.Author: S. K. Duraivelu "Amazon Buyer"
Reviews.Content: This laptop is decent laptop for the price. It has good value for the money.Got this laptop today. Its awesome in display. Its having good performaance as well.Screen is awesome.. Its a best buy for 300!!Edited Comments:  I need to return this laptop as the inbuilt mic is having some problem and doesnt work as expected. Amazon couldnt replace it so returned it back.
